meanings.sent1: I will wait til you finish your homework.
meanings.sent2: We played outside til the sun went down.
meanings.sent3: He danced til the cows came home.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed til the last light faded.
meanings.sent5: She sang til her voice grew tired.

meanings.sent1: The store is open til 9 p.m.
meanings.sent2: I will be working til the project deadline.
meanings.sent3: He practiced til the break of dawn.
meanings.sent4: The cat waited til the mouse appeared.
meanings.sent5: The tree stood tall til the storm passed.
